title: YouTube Shorts invade the biggest screen in your home
description: You can now watch your favorite Shorts on smart TVs, but they may not work on models made before 2019.

title: Microsoft is being sued over Github Copilot piracy
description: GitHub Copilot has breached the DMCA three times for each of its 1.2 million users, says claimant, totalling $9 billion.

title: PC Gaming Show 2023's preview event is coming later in November — here's what you need to know
description: The PC Gaming Show: 2023 Preview event will showcase trailers and gameplay ahead of the main PC Gaming Show 2023.

title: Google Cloud just backed one of the biggest blockchain firms around
description: Google Cloud continues on its Web3 journey, builds relations with Solana to extend blockchain support.

title: RTX 4090 Ti benchmark may have leaked and it looks pretty impressive
description: Both the RTX 4090 Ti and the RTX 4080 are the subject of several new benchmark leaks, which look rather impressive so far.

title: Many of us still aren't putting password protection on our Wi-Fi
description: Some admit they don't even know how to change the password, new report finds.

title: Microsoft Teams is getting a major speed boost, you lucky things
description: Up to 30% faster switching between Microsoft Teams chats and channels.

title: AMD is squaring up against the RTX 4080 - and might win
description: AMD confirms their flagship GPU will be competing directly against the RTX 4080.

title: Fortnite x Polo collab is still cheaper than Overwatch 2 skins
description: The newest fashion collab between Fortnite and Polo shows us how in-game purchases are here to stay.

title: God of War Ragnarok's Leviathan axe makes great use of this DualSense feature
description: God of War Ragnarok accessibility options include support for motion/gyro aiming with the PS5 Dualsense controller

title: The Continental on Peacock: everything we know so far
description: Here's everything we know about The Continental, Peacock's John Wick prequel TV series.

title: Cloudflare cut off this phishing-as-a-service platform, so it moved to Russia
description: Robin Banks' new hosting provider is infamous for ignoring takedown requests.

title: Star Wars: The Acolyte adds major Squid Game & Matrix stars to its fantastic cast
description: The next major Star Wars Disney Plus show has begun filming – and a number of big stars have been added to its cast.

title: Audio-Technica's wooden wireless headphones have a unique audiophile feature
description: Limited-edition ATH-WB2022 headphones are the first Bluetooth headphones to have balanced stereo built-in.

title: Microsoft thinks China could be stockpiling cybercrime threats
description: Zero-day flaw reports from China have declined, but the country still poses a threat to the US, researchers claim.

title: The UK government is scanning all of the country's internet connections
description: UK cybersecurity agency wants to gain a better understanding of potential dangers.

title: Most businesses admit they would pay up to get rid of ransomware
description: More than three-quarters of firms would pay a ransom demand just to get back to work quickly.

title: Apple might be changing the 'Hey Siri' wake word on your iPhone
description: Apple reportedly wants to drop the 'Hey Siri' wake phrase and replace it with just 'Siri', though the change might be a while away.

title: I tried Devialet’s spherical new speaker and it makes Amazon Echo feel like a toy
description: Devialet’s new Mania portable smart speaker boasts 'adaptive cross-stereo', and it's a stunner.

title: The Red Cross wants its emblem to protect vital technology during wartime
description: Humanity so heavily relies on technology that some of the humanitarian organization’s infrastructure should be protected, it says.

title: Mastodon is a great Twitter alternative, but it needs to be easier to sign up
description: After trying out Mastodon in the past week, it's great in some areas... and confusing in others.

title: Leak suggests Nvidia RTX 4080 will be a beast - but still no match for the RTX 4090
description: Nvidia GeForce RTX 4080 leak shows it's 15% faster than the mighty RTX 3090 Ti.

title: Attacks on Microsoft SQL have seen a huge rise
description: Threat actors have been installing all kinds of nasties on Microsoft SQL, from Cobalt Strike beacons to ransomware.

title: Nvidia RTX 4080 set to sell out on day one, with even less stock than RTX 4090
description: It looks like Nvidia wants to push consumers towards old RTX 3000 stock as Black Friday nears.

title: Xiaomi 13 leak shows a gorgeous new design with iPhone 14 influences
description: Unofficial renders have given us our first look at the possible design of the Xiaomi 13 and Xiaomi 13 Pro.

title: 4 big theories we have about Stranger Things 5 episode 1's title
description: The title for the first episode of Stranger Things season 5 has been revealed – here's what we think it means.

title: Apple warns of looming iPhone 14 shortage and longer wait times
description: Anyone waiting to get their hands on an iPhone 14 model will need to be patient as Covid restrictions impact one of Apple’s China-based factories.
